Description.Text: Hotel Cresta is a modern 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Davos. Highlights include onsite dining, an indoor swimming pool, sauna, garden and good transport links. Davos is a charming town located on the Landwasser river in the Swiss Alps. Nearby places of interest include the Kirchner Museum and the Forest Cemetery. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular regional destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise property with wood-fronted balconies and a garden. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool, sauna and exercise area. Massages are available on request. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 20sqm and decorated in a bright, modern style with light wood furniture. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, work desk and en-suite bathroom. The restaurant offers Swiss and international dishes in a relaxed and friendly setting, while guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the stylish hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite.
